spells.name: Adoration
spells.description: You gain a bonus on Diplomacy checks and performance combat checks.

spells.name: Animal Aspect
spells.description: You gain some of the beneficial qualities of an animal.

spells.name: Ant Haul, Communal
spells.description: As ant haul, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
spells.description: Grants a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

spells.name: Brow Gasher
spells.description: Slashing weapon deals bleed damage to an opponent's head.

spells.name: Bullet Shield
spells.description: You gain a +4 deflection bonus to AC against firearm attacks.

spells.name: Certain Grip
spells.description: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks and to CMD.

spells.name: Destabilize Powder
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm is prone to misfire.

spells.name: Endure Elements, Communal
spells.description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Fiery Shuriken
spells.description: Calls forth several fiery projectiles ready to be flung at opponents.

spells.name: Frost Fall
spells.description: The area is covered in a chilling frost.

spells.name: Kinetic Reverberation
spells.description: Channels the force of an enemy's attack back into its weapon.

spells.name: Magic Siege Engine
spells.description: Siege gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.

spells.name: Mount, Communal
spells.description: As mount, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Pilfering Hand
spells.description: You may seize an object or manipulate it from afar.

spells.name: Reloading Hands
spells.description: Loads a single shot into your weapon every round.

spells.name: Protection from Chaos, Communal
spells.description: As protection from chaos, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Protection from Evil, Communal
spells.description: As protection from evil, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Protection from Good, Communal
spells.description: As protection from good, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Protection from Law, Communal
spells.description: As protection from law, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Qualm
spells.description: Target gains penalties on ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks until it spends an entire round doing nothing.

spells.name: Recoil Fire
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm generates excessive recoil.

spells.name: Reinforce Armaments, Communal
spells.description: As reinforce armaments, but you may divide the duration among objects touched.

spells.name: Returning Weapon
spells.description: Grants a weapon the returning special weapon quality.

spells.name: Ricochet Shot
spells.description: Imbues a projectile weapon to give its ammunition the ability to ricochet.

spells.name: Spontaneous Immolation
spells.description: Target takes 3d6 points of fire damage and catches on fire.

spells.name: Stabilize Powder
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm is less likely to misfire.

spells.name: Tactical Acumen
spells.description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

spells.name: Telekinetic Assembly
spells.description: Assembles a siege engine using 1 fewer worker for every two caster levels.

spells.name: Thunder Fire
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm deafens opponents.

spells.name: Twisted Space
spells.description: Targeted creature's attacks target a random square instead of the intended target.

spells.name: Warding Weapon
spells.description: The weapon you use for the focus of this spell defends you, allowing you to cast spells without provoking attacks of opportunity.
